Exceptions:
Expecting a field name but nothing was acceptable, so moving onto next whitespace
itle = {A } # "Book",                   % an in-entry comment  editor = {  John 
                                        ^

Expecting an = between the field name and the field value
= {A } # "Book",                   % an in-entry comment  editor = {  John Q.  R
                                        ^

Expecting an = between the field name and the field value
"Book",                   % an in-entry comment  editor = {  John Q.  Random} # 
                                        ^

Expecting an = between the field name and the field value
                 % an in-entry comment  editor = {  John Q.  Random} # junk,  pu
                                        ^

Expecting a , after the BibTeX key
 Sons},   year = 1922  }  @string(macro = "macro  text ",          foo = {blah b
                                        ^

Expecting a , after the BibTeX key
re balanced), even {braces})  @preamble{" This is   a preamble" #             {-
                                        ^
Warnings: There is no key in this BibTeX reference

Comments:
= "macro  text ",
        foo = {blah blah  } # " ding dong ")

% this is a lexical comment, which is never seen by the grammar and
% thus can't be tested (well, not yet at least)

(this is a comment entry, anything at all can go in it (as long
         as parentheses are balanced
